column2: Base year Scope total 3 emissions covered by target as % of total base year emissions in Scope 3 (in all Scope 3 categories)
column3: Base year emissions covered by target in all selected Scopes as % of total base year emissions in all selected Scopes
column6: Total emissions in target year covered by target in all selected Scopes (metric tons CO2e)  [auto-calculated]

column8: Scope 2 emissions in reporting year covered by target (metric tons CO2e)
